    ViewDelegate ¶
    Source

    ViewDelegate :: struct {
	drawInMTKView:          proc "c" (self: ^ViewDelegate, view: ^View),
	drawableSizeWillChange: proc "c" (self: ^ViewDelegate, view: ^View, size: objc_Foundation.Size),
	user_data:              rawptr,
}
